location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint.Dimensions: 310 x 190mm, on sheet 325 x 200mm

mods.abstract: Map in blueprint showing the area of Khor Jarama [Khawr al Jarāmah], at Ras Al Hadd, Oman. The site was under discussion for use as an alighting area. The map also highlights an RAF petrol store.The map is prepared by G S Cooper, Civil Engineer, Air Headquarters, Iraq as part of a report titled ‘REPORT ON SOUTH ARABIAN COAST- INSPECTION TOUR- SEPTEMBER, 1942’. The map itself is marked as Appendix E.
